name: fmt::float::float_to_general_debug

fmt::float::GeneralFormat::already_round.doc:
Determines if a value should use exponential based on its magnitude, given the precondition
 that it will not be rounded any further before it is displayed.

option::Option: Unknown([Downcast(VariantIdx(1, ThreadLocalIndex)), Field(0, Ty { id: 136, kind: RigidTy(Uint(U16)) })])
